definition: external auditory meatus/auditory canal, between the outer ear 外耳 and tympanum 鼓膜

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Also inspect the opening of the ear canal for discharge, swelling, or redness.
sentences.chinese: 还视察外耳道孔的排写物，肿胀，或发红。

sentences.english: The ear canal will appear dirty with red or black ear wax.
sentences.chinese: 该外耳道堂肮脏与红色或黑色耳蜡。

sentences.english: Drop warm ear drops in external canal.
sentences.chinese: 将加过温的药液滴入外耳道。

sentences.english: Objective To explore into the feasibility and outcome of otic endoscope in the treatment of external auditory canal cholesteatoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨耳内镜下治疗外耳道胆脂瘤的可行性和效果。

sentences.english: The concentrations you attain in the external canal with topical antibiotic drops is MUCH higher.
sentences.chinese: 在外耳道局部使用的抗生素滴剂浓度更高。

sentences.english: Conductive hearing impairment is a problem in the outer or middle ear.
sentences.chinese: 传导性听力障碍是外耳道或中耳道出现问题。

sentences.english: Swimmer's ear is an infection of the outer ear canal.
sentences.chinese: 游泳性耳炎是一种外耳道感染。

sentences.english: Ear canal foreign body removal, with otoscope, under anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 外耳道异物除去术，使用耳道镜，并有麻醉。

sentences.english: Treatment of external auditory canal cholesteatoma with surgical method;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨外耳道胆脂瘤的病因和治疗方法。

definition: internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)
ear dirt/common word for earwax 耵聹|耵聍
Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
